languages.text: Согласно уцелевшим данным Последний восход устраивал налеты на незащищенные планеты, угоняя в плен жителей для темных ритуалов. Колдовство помогало еретикам быстро перемещаться между мирами и уходить от карательных ударов. Теперь Простор может вздохнуть с облегчением — вы устранили чудовищную угрозу и спасли миллионы жизней.

Judging from the surviving data, the Final Dawn raided unprotected planets and captured their inhabitants for use in dark rituals. The sorcery helped the heretics move swiftly between worlds and evade punitive strikes. Now the Expanse can breathe a sigh of relief, for you have eliminated a monstrous threat and saved millions of lives.
languages.original_text: Согласно уцелевшим данным Последний восход устраивал налеты на незащищенные планеты, угоняя в плен жителей для темных ритуалов. Колдовство помогало еретикам быстро перемещаться между мирами и уходить от карательных ударов. Теперь Простор может вздохнуть с облегчением — вы устранили чудовищную угрозу и спасли миллионы жизней.

traits.locale_text: Judging from the surviving data, the Final Dawn raided unprotected planets and captured their inhabitants for use in dark rituals. The sorcery helped the heretics move swiftly between worlds and evade punitive strikes. Now the Expanse can breathe a sigh of relief, you have eliminated a monstrous threat and saved millions of lives.

The sorcery helped the heretics move swiftly between worlds and evade punitive strikes. The sorcery helped the heretics move swiftly between worlds and evade punitive strikes. languages.text: Den intakten Daten zufolge hat die Letzte Dämmerung ungeschützte Planeten überfallen und deren Bewohner für dunkle Rituale verschleppt. Mittels ihrer Magie konnten die Ketzer schneller von Welt zu Welt reisen und Strafaktionen ausweichen. Nun kann die Ausdehnung erleichtert aufatmen, denn du hast eine monströse Bedrohung eliminiert und Millionen von Leben gerettet.
languages.original_text: Judging from the surviving data, the Final Dawn raided unprotected planets and captured their inhabitants for use in dark rituals. The sorcery helped the heretics move swiftly between worlds and evade punitive strikes. Now the Expanse can breathe a sigh of relief, for you have eliminated a monstrous threat and saved millions of lives.

traits.locale_text: Den intakten Daten zufolge hat die Letzte Dämmerung ungeschützte Planeten überfallen und deren Bewohner für dunkle Rituale verschleppt. Mittels ihrer Magie konnten die Ketzer schneller von Welt zu Welt reisen und Strafaktionen ausweichen. Nun kann die Ausdehnung erleichtert aufatmen, denn du hast eine monströse Bedrohung eliminiert und Millionen von Leben gerettet.

languages.text: À en juger par les données demeurées intactes, l'Aube finale s'en est prise à des planètes sans protection afin de capturer leurs habitants pour alimenter ses sinistres rituels. La sorcellerie a aidé les hérétiques à se déplacer rapidement d'un monde à l'autre et à échapper aux frappes punitives. Désormais, les Étendues peuvent respirer plus librement, car vous avez éliminé une menace redoutable et sauvé ce faisant des millions de vies.
languages.original_text: Judging from the surviving data, the Final Dawn raided unprotected planets and captured their inhabitants for use in dark rituals. The sorcery helped the heretics move swiftly between worlds and evade punitive strikes. Now the Expanse can breathe a sigh of relief, for you have eliminated a monstrous threat and saved millions of lives.

traits.locale_text: À en juger par les données demeurées intactes, l'Aube finale s'en est prise à des planètes sans protection afin de capturer leurs habitants pour alimenter ses sinistres rituels. La sorcellerie a aidé les hérétiques à se déplacer rapidement d'un monde à l'autre et à échapper aux frappes punitives. Désormais, les Étendues peuvent respirer plus librement, car vous avez éliminé une menace redoutable et sauvé ce faisant des millions de vies.

languages.text: A juzgar por los datos supervivientes, el Amanecer Final asaltaba planetas desprotegidos y secuestraba a sus habitantes para usarlos en rituales siniestros. La hechicería permitía a los herejes moverse rápidamente entre los diferentes planetas y esquivar la justicia. La Extensión podrá respirar aliviada ahora que has eliminado esta monstruosa amenaza y salvado millones de vidas.
languages.original_text: Judging from the surviving data, the Final Dawn raided unprotected planets and captured their inhabitants for use in dark rituals. The sorcery helped the heretics move swiftly between worlds and evade punitive strikes. Now the Expanse can breathe a sigh of relief, for you have eliminated a monstrous threat and saved millions of lives.

traits.locale_text: A juzgar por los datos supervivientes, el Amanecer Final asaltaba planetas desprotegidos y secuestraba a sus habitantes para usarlos en rituales siniestros. La hechicería permitía a los herejes moverse rápidamente entre los diferentes planetas y esquivar la justicia. La Extensión podrá respirar aliviada ahora que has eliminado esta monstruosa amenaza y salvado millones de vidas.

languages.text: 生き残っていたデータから判断すると、「最後の夜明け」は無謀否惑星を襲撃し、闇の儀式に使うべく、その住民たちを捕まえた。魔術は異端者たちが世界間を素早く移動し、制裁攻撃を回避する役に立っていた。今、エクスパンスは安堵に息をつくことができる。なぜならあなたが巨大な脅威を排除し、何百万人もの命を救ったのだから。
languages.original_text: Judging from the surviving data, the Final Dawn raided unprotected planets and captured their inhabitants for use in dark rituals. The sorcery helped the heretics move swiftly between worlds and evade punitive strikes. Now the Expanse can breathe a sigh of relief, for you have eliminated a monstrous threat and saved millions of lives.

traits.locale_text: 生き残っていたデータから判断すると、「最後の夜明け」は無謀否惑星を襲撃し、闇の儀式に使うべく、その住民たちを捕まえた。魔術は異端者たちが世界間を素早く移動し、制裁攻撃を回避する役に立っていた。今、エクスパンスは安堵に息をつくことができる。なぜならあなたが巨大な脅威を排除し、何百万人もの命を救ったのだから。

languages.text: 根据残存的数据来看，“终末黎明”教派袭击了许多无人保护的行星，将无数居民献为人祭，举行了邪恶仪式。在巫术的力量之下，那些异端分子可以在数个世界之间快速穿梭，躲避制裁。如今，科罗努斯扩区终于可以松一口气了，因为你消灭了这个可怕的威胁，拯救了亿万人民的性命。
languages.original_text: Judging from the surviving data, the Final Dawn raided unprotected planets and captured their inhabitants for use in dark rituals. The sorcery helped the heretics move swiftly between worlds and evade punitive strikes. Now the Expanse can breathe a sigh of relief, for you have eliminated a monstrous threat and saved millions of lives.

traits.locale_text: 根据残存的数据来看，“终末黎明”教派袭击了许多无人保护的行星，将无数居民献为人祭，举行了邪恶仪式。在巫术的力量之下，那些异端分子可以在数个世界之间快速穿梭，躲避制裁。如今，科罗努斯扩区终于可以松一口气了，因为你消灭了这个可怕的威胁，拯救了亿万人民的性命。

languages.text: Sağlam kalan veriye bakılırsa Nihai Şafak, korunmayan gezegenlere baskın düzenleyip karanlık ayinlerinde kullanmak için gezegen halklarını esir ediyor. Sahirlik sayesinde kâfirler, dünyalar arasında hızla seyahat edip cezai hamlelerden kaçınabilmiş. Artık Enginlik rahat bir nefes alabilir. Çünkü korkunç bir tehdidi ortadan kaldırarak milyonlarca hayatı kurtardın.
languages.original_text: Judging from the surviving data, the Final Dawn raided unprotected planets and captured their inhabitants for use in dark rituals. The sorcery helped the heretics move swiftly between worlds and evade punitive strikes. Now the Expanse can breathe a sigh of relief, for you have eliminated a monstrous threat and saved millions of lives.
